column2: "You must have lots of time to kill, judging from the way you're just loitering around here. "
"If you've got so much free time, maybe you should go help out those other rookies out there."

"Rookies support other rookies!
That's an unwritten law in ARKS!"
"So get off your butt and go blaze a trail through the Tunnels! Explore every nook and cranny."
